website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best choice for professionals. If you're looking for a top-quality tool belt, you won't find a better choice.
cons: Its durability will save you money in the long run

customer_reviews.title: ... for what you pay for these bags are the best Real comfortable spacious all my tools the fit for ...
customer_reviews.text: You get for what you pay for these bags are the best Real comfortable spacious all my tools the fit for sheet metal worker
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this belt is pretty. HEAVY DUTY everything. Craftsmanship second to none. Not too heavy, shouldn't need suspenders for now. If your on the fence about this, get it. Mine came two days earlier than expected. I'm not a pro, Just an avid DIY-er. I have no doubt this will out live me. Once you have this in your hands you will wonder how they sell this so cheap for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Tacocat

customer_reviews.title: Best belt I've seen on site
customer_reviews.text: Great belt even being a bit pricey, only thing I don't love is the lack of handles and they do tip easily when your not wearing them. Do yourself a favor and get suspension of some kind they are a bit heavy, but that's expected with high quality bags. Definitely lets you stay organized and get more done with specific places you don't need to look down to grab things. If your wearing them every day their well worth the money, if not you'd likely be happier going cheaper for occasional carpentry.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: One happy contractor's wife
customer_reviews.text: The husband absolutely LOVES this belt. Worth every penny. We also purchased the Occidental harness straps at the same time to help with the weight, and he's delighted. No more aches or pains from wearing a loaded down tool belt all day. He's happier at work and does his work with more efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Built VERY well.
customer_reviews.text: The tool belt this replaced was an original Bucket Boss Mullet Buster. This belt is rock solid! It fits everything I need and more for framing. 35' Fat Max fits in the tape measure pocket, and my Linux utility knife fits as well. I definitely recommend this belt.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool placement
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between this and a Diamondback Tool Belt Denali. My wife surprised me with going ahead and ordering after seeing me constantly reading reivews and griping about my previous nail bags. I gave it 4 stars only because it is slightly heavy if you don't wear suspenders, which I don't. But I have tried it with suspenders and the weight isn't noticable at all. I personally just don't enjoy wearing suspenders. Overall its a set a nail bags that is finely crafted and the tool placement layout is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags but be aware that they are canvas bags ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags but be aware that they are canvas bags with leather accents. I ended up returning mine for a full leather set.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much the best there is
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really beat these but not surprised, they are the top of the line. I bought these and one other pair around the $150 point but my fella picked these hands down. He absolutely loves them and they’re sexy on his hot carpenter self. Woowoo!
customer_reviews.author: Erika S.

customer_reviews.title: Long wearing
customer_reviews.text: I've been a carpenter for 25 years and for 17 of those I've worn Occidental bags. 3rd pair of the stronghold style. Diddent really need a new set but I have my son working for me. Watching him struggle with a set of rag bags out of the trailer made me think. So I bought a new set in the capachino color and handed him his first real set if bags. Slightly broke in. He said it's like a whole new world. And now he wears his bags all day. No complaints. Best bags I've ever owned. Thanks Tim
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of bags! I should have purchased a long time ago. I have went through about 15 sets of bags in 25 years avoiding spending this kind of money. Looks like these should hold up a good 15 yrs or more.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had this for 16 months now and it's still in great shape. He uses it everyday and it's loaded up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Husband is left handed and needed a tool bag for ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband is left handed and needed a tool bag for work that would hold up This bag is tough and he is in heaven Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: good belt adjustable stationary bags stay up and are comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: good belt adjustable stationary bags stay up and are comfortable on the hips...with suspenders best hook up so far after 20yrs as a carpenter
customer_reviews.author: jonathan mark mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a better price than I paid 5 years ago from another store. I'm a full time carpenter and find this tool belt to be sturdy, well made, comfortable and it has pockets in the right places.
customer_reviews.author: susan waddell

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a super high quality tool belt that is really comfortable. Had it for a couple of months. Time will tell if it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best tool-belt
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best tool-belt I have ever owned. Incredible quality and craftsmanship. Intuitive, hand-specific placement and organization. Very comfortable. Has truly been a game changer for me at work.
customer_reviews.author: psps4

customer_reviews.title: The last bags you will ever buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Infinite sizing due to adjustable belt system. Large pocket holds cordless impact. Super-good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Best bags ever
customer_reviews.text: If you’re hesitant on buying bite the bullet and do it I was debating on getting these bags for a year and a half I’ve had them for about two months now and I have not been happy with the set of bags they are so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint would be how deep and bulky they are. Still the most comfortable one I have ever worn

customer_reviews.title: Not leather....beware if that’s an issue for you.
customer_reviews.text: The product is absolutely amazing but it is NOT all leather. If is a denier material with leather accents. The darker parts all all non leather.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so much more comfortable than my previous bags. Great quality

customer_reviews.title: This tool belt is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This tool belt is great!!! From the first day I wore it was the most comfortable tool belt ever !!!

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! 10years in carpentry and finally perfect fluency! Will need to find some hooks for it but even without it impact with 9 amp battery fits perfect in the big bags.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bags are very comfortable and are exceptionally well crafted. Only issue is that I have no pouch to hold my iPhone and calculator securely.

customer_reviews.title: Is not the same as the model picture

customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. It's definitely worth the money and purpose. Very comfortable 👍👌. If husband is happy, so am I. Thank you...

customer_reviews.text: Fit great durable room for all the tools I need. Not really made for smaller people I wear 32 jeans and I’ve got the adjustment as tight as it will go and I’m one notch from the tightes

customer_reviews.title: Occidentals are the only way to go
customer_reviews.text: I love these nail bags! Best ones made in my humble opinion. They are made of real leather and outlast any others!

customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool belt I have ever owned.. No more cheap ones from home depot. Nothing fits and lasts like top quality leather..!!!

customer_reviews.text: these are light and sturdy. Well worth the high price.

customer_reviews.text: The bag is great. Unfortunately we have to return it because it's not quite the right one. Bummer!

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Best belt i had so far loving it everything about it

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Carpenter's Tool Belt
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool belt for carpenters... Comfortable and functional... Made in USA... Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for a fabulous product!!!!! I love it so much! I'm impressed...

customer_reviews.title: So far so GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so GREAT!!! Only thing is I wish I hadn't waited this long and just spent the money and got one. Far superior to any belt I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: Zach Conerty

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a tool belt for a living. He's wanted a made in the USA belt for a long time and he finally found a good quality one. He thinks the price is high but for a US product it's worth the extra dough. The pouches are big and durable. The belt is adjustable. It's a great belt, my husband is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Karas

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bag
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bags hold a lot of tools and a lot of nails with comes in handy when your up on the roof. The quality of these bags amaze me.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Large side bags
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't really what I was expecting - it's canvas bags and not leather. Plus side is the side bags are big enough to hold a cordless drill so I think it will work better for me than the smaller leather side bags that I have seen on other belts by Occidental. Very happy with product. Hope it holds up as I believe it will.
customer_reviews.author: icspirits

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think that this is the best belt on the market and this is the best price any where.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bags I've ever had. Tons of space for every tool, very pleased

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! They replaced my old occidental full leather set
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work and they work really good they last long and very durable.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money for this quality and functional tool belt. Have had these last ten years with daily use on the job. Excellent value over time.
customer_reviews.author: nausetsunrise

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing tool belt. Fully adjustable and the most comfortable belt ever worn. Holds a lot of weight. When paired with the suspenders it becomes very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Tool Bag out in the market today, bar none!
customer_reviews.text: Are these expensive? Yes! Are they worth it? Absolutely times 10! I have no back pain now and I usually work all summer doing 7/12s and these bags have made all the difference. I really don't have any complaints, it is superior craftsmanship. Don't forget you can use this as nice Tax write-off too so your basically getting for free. Great product, Great deal, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NJF

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: This seems a bit over priced, but is a very nice sturdy light weight tool belt. I have been using one of their all leather tool belts for well over a decade and still use it on a regular basis, but I needed a better tool belt for a worker. I had bought a cheap belt from Harbor Freight, which started to fall apart the first time he used it, so that reminded me why buying cheap is not really a good value. Shoulder straps will be a wise investment as well for this tool belt.
customer_reviews.author: Copper By Design

customer_reviews.title: tool belt
customer_reviews.text: Fit is very comfortable. Tools do not fall out of the belt. It is the most comfortable tool belt that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice belt but way too big for me. I need smaller pouches. Quick shipper! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best bags
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't kill your back and holds almost every tool. The only complaint I have is the phone pouch doesn't fit a smart phone. I ordered an extra calculator pouch that works well for my HTC.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a real deal carpenter and it meets my expectations. Instead of the Home Cheapo belts

customer_reviews.title: waiting longer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of occidental bags and I had the first set of leather adjustable fit for 8 years and I loved them. These are ok buy bulky And the bottom pouch with the divider in it is kind of a pain to get your hand in and out of for fasteners. I don't think I'd buy another set like these again but it's still early.

product_meta.title: Occidental Leather 9855 Adjust-to-Fit Fat Lip Tool Bag Set - Cafe
product_meta.description: Size:right handA comfortable belt for production carpenters featuring our Fat Lip bag design. Ten inch deep industrial nylon bags with leather-reinforced bottom and corners. Features 24 pockets and tool holders. The adjust-to-fit system provides a full range of adjustment from pant waist size 32" to 41". Belt section is based upon our original leather buscadero design, but utilizing high density neoprene, rugged commercial nylon and leather components. Tools are not included. Hand-Specific Tool Holders Promote Maximum Working Rhythm on the Job.
feature_bullets: A comfortable belt for production carpenters featuring our Fat Lip Bag Design
Ten inch deep industrial nylon bags with leather-reinforced bottom and corners. D Rings Pre-Installed for Use with Suspension Systems
Features multiple tool holders and a 5020 2-in-1 Tool & Hammer Holder in the rear
Tool Bag Dimensions: Main Tool Bag : 10"w x 10"d, Outer Bag: 6.5" x 5.5"
Fastener Bag Dimensions: Main Bag : 10"w x 10"d,Outer Bag : 9" x 6", Upper Bag : 5" x 4.5"
